name: Koala March
text: You can target 1 "Koala" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target but detroy it during the End Phase. If this card is in the GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion monster that lists a "Koala" monster as one of its materials, using cards from your hand or field as Fusion Material. You can only use each effect of "Koala March" once per turn.
